name: Unbound Devilment Within the Grimoire
description:
Bullet hell fan-game utilizing Unity 2019's DOTS package

Defeat the runaway Tsukumogami and return the forbidden grimoire back to your master, Patchouli.

Controls:
Arrows: movement
Z: Fire
Shift: Slows down your movement
Esc: Skip cutscene and dialogue

This wasn't made with public consumption in mind, but more on finishing my research essay. So, sorry if there are some janky experiences.
